    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AboutDialog
    Modal dialog that displays basic information about the application.
    AppConfig
    Centralized application configuration class.
    AppTheme
    Centralized color palette for CleanStream UI.
    AuthManager
    Manages authentication, session token persistence and "Remember me" behavior.
    CleanStreamApp
    Entry point (main class) of the CleanStream desktop application.
    CommandExecutor
    Utility class responsible for: Executing external system commands (e.g.
    DetectOS
    Utility class responsible for: Detecting the current operating system Resolving the system Downloads directory Providing a safe default download folder for the application
    DownloadExecutionController
    Controller responsible for executing downloads using yt-dlp and updating the Swing UI.
    DownloadsController
    Controller that manages the "Downloads" screen: local scan, cloud listing, filtering, selection UX and cloud sync actions.
    DownloadsScanner
    Scans a downloads directory and builds ResourceDownloaded objects from files found.
    Icons
    Utility class for loading, scaling and composing icons used in the UI.
    ListHoverSupport
    Utility class that adds hover (mouse-over) support to a JList.
    LoginPanel
    Login screen panel for CleanStream.
    MainController
    MainController is the central orchestrator of the CleanStream application.
    MainFrame
    Main application window for CleanStream.
    MediaPolling
    Abstraction layer over the external Media Polling component.
    MediaUpdateEvent
    Event object emitted by MediaPolling implementations when new media is detected in the cloud.
    MediaUpdateListener
    Listener interface used to receive media update notifications from MediaPolling implementations.
    MetadataTableModel
    Table model used to display metadata for a selected ResourceDownloaded.
    PreferencesData
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) that encapsulates all user preferences related to the CleanStream application.
    PreferencesPanel
    Preferences UI panel for configuring and persisting application settings.
    PreferencesValidator
    Utility class responsible for validating PreferencesData.
    ResourceDownloaded
    Represents a media resource downloaded by the user.
    ResourceDownloadedRenderer
    Custom Swing renderer for ResourceDownloaded items inside a JList.
    ResourceState
    Represents the synchronization state of a media resource between the local machine and the DI Media Network (cloud).
    RoigMediaPollingAdapter
    Adapter implementation of MediaPolling that wraps RoigMediaPollingComponent.
    UiColors
    Common UI colors used across CleanStream components.
    UploaderResolver
    Resolves uploader nicknames from the backend in an asynchronous and thread-safe way.
    UploaderResolver.NickApi
    Functional interface representing the external API call to retrieve a nickname from a user ID.
    UrlUtils
    Utility class for normalizing and sanitizing base URLs.
    UserPreferences
    Centralized manager for persistent user preferences.
    VideoQuality
    Represents the video quality options available for download.
